bootstrap-components-error-tracking-cate: Tracking category for pages with faulty calls to a bootstrap tag.
bootstrap-components-tracking-category: Tracking category for pages with calls to at least one bootstrap tag.
bootstrap-components-close-element: Text for the close button of various components.
bootstrap-components-help-attributes: Headline in help text, introducing the allowed attributes for this component.
bootstrap-components-help-heading:
Heading for a component's individual help screen. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the component
bootstrap-components-help-allowed-values:
Text in an attribute's help output, listing all allowed values for the attribute. Parameters:
* $1 - the list of all allowed values.
bootstrap-components-help-allowed-value-: Text in an attribute's help output, indicating that any value is allowed.
Text in an attributes help output, indicating that all values are being ignored.
bootstrap-components-image-modal-source-: Text on the button, linking to the image source page.
bootstrap-components-badge-content-missi: Error message that indicates, that the text is missing in a badge component. Please supply an input text after the double colon.
bootstrap-components-button-target-missi: Error message that indicates, that the button component has its target missing. Please supply a target after the double colon.
bootstrap-components-button-target-inval: Error message that indicates, that the button component has an invalid target. Please supply a valid target after the double colon.
bootstrap-components-carousel-images-mis: Error message that indicates, that there were no images supplied to the carousel component.
bootstrap-components-glyph-icon-name-mis: Error message that indicates, that there has been no icon name supplied to the glyphicon component. Please supply an input text after the double colon.
bootstrap-components-label-content-missi: Error message that indicates, that the content is missing in a label component. Please supply an input text after the double colon.
bootstrap-components-modal-text-missing: Error message that indicates, that the text is missing in a modal component. Please supply a non empty attribute text.
bootstrap-components-popover-heading-mis: Error message that indicates, that a popover has no heading supplied. Please supply a non empty attribute heading.
bootstrap-components-popover-text-missin: Error message that indicates, that a popover has no text supplied. Please supply a non empty attribute text.
bootstrap-components-tooltip-content-mis: Error message that indicates, that a tooltip is missing the text to be tooltip'd. Please supply an input text after the double colon.
bootstrap-components-tooltip-text-missin: Error message that indicates, that a tooltip is missing its tooltip. Please supply a non empty attribute text.
bootstrap-components-accordion-descripti: Describes the function of the accordion component.
bootstrap-components-accordion-help: Gives a detailed help for the accordion component.
bootstrap-components-alert-description: Describes the function of the alert component.
bootstrap-components-alert-help: Gives a detailed help for the alert component.
bootstrap-components-badge-description: Describes the function of the badge component.
bootstrap-components-badge-help: Gives a detailed help for the badge component.
bootstrap-components-button-description: Describes the function of the button component.
bootstrap-components-button-help: Gives a detailed help for the button component.
bootstrap-components-carousel-descriptio: Describes the function of the carousel component.
bootstrap-components-carousel-help: Gives a detailed help for the carousel component.
bootstrap-components-collapse-descriptio: Describes the function of the collapse component.
bootstrap-components-collapse-help: Gives a detailed help for the collapse component.
bootstrap-components-help-description: Describes the function of the bootstrap component help.
bootstrap-components-help-help: Gives a detailed help for the bootstrap component help.
bootstrap-components-icon-description: Describes the function of the icon component.
bootstrap-components-icon-help: Gives a detailed help for the icon component.
bootstrap-components-jumbotron-descripti: Describes the function of the jumbotron component.
bootstrap-components-jumbotron-help: Gives a detailed help for the jumbotron component.
bootstrap-components-label-description: Describes the function of the label component.
bootstrap-components-label-help: Gives a detailed help for the label component.

bootstrap-components-modal-help: Gives a detailed help for the modal component.

bootstrap-components-attribute-class-des: Gives a description for the class attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-color-des: Gives a description for the color attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-collapsib: Gives a description for the collapsible attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-disabled-: Gives a description for the disabled attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-dismissib: Gives a description for the dismissible attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-footer-de: Gives a description for the footer attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-heading-d: Gives a description for the heading attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-help-desc: Gives a description for the help attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-id-descri: Gives a description for the id attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-link-desc: Gives a description for the link attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-placement: Gives a description for the placement attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-size-desc: Gives a description for the size attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-style-des: Gives a description for the style attribute.
bootstrap-components-attribute-text-desc: Gives a description for the text attribute.
